Class Database

  • Object
    • Database
  • public class Database
extends Object
    This program downloads covid19 tracking information for each of the fifty states in the United States. It then creates and accesses a PostgreSQL database, based on the following user specifications: Database name, username and password. It creates the following tables: states, positive, hospitalizations, deaths. It presents the user with options to query the database and to display data by state, date, or both state and date. The results are output as an HTML table, formatted with DataTable in bootstrap. Upon completion, the program deletes the session's database and user. The result of the queries remain saved as html files in an output folder.
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Rachel Friedman

      • main

        public static void main​(String[] args)
        launching point of program
        Parameters:

      • retrieveDataFromWebsite

        public static String retrieveDataFromWebsite()
        Retrieves latest data from covidtracking.com.
        Saves all data to data/data.csv in local directory.
        Returns:
        a String with all the fields from the header row with data types, separated by a comma.
        This string can be used in a CREATE TABLE SQL statement for creating the columns in the table.

      • createDatabaseAndUser

        public static String[] createDatabaseAndUser()
        Prompts user for a database name, username and password.
        Creates database with name specified.
        Creates user with user and password as specified.
        Grants user all privileges for newly created database.
        Returns:
        an array with 3 Strings: database name, username, password

        public static Connection connectToDatabase​(String db,
                                           String username,
                                           String password)
        Connects to database db with specified username and password
        Parameters:
        db - the database to connect to
        username - the username to connect with
        password - the password to connect with
        Returns:
        the database connection

                                  String tableName,
                                  String allFields)
        Creates a table using allFields as columns and tableName as table.
        Parameters:
        connection - the connection to the current database
        tableName - the name of the table to be created
        allFields - the column names and data types

      • createTable

        public static void createTable​(Connection connection,
                               String tableName,
                               String columns)
        Creates a table in this database with tableName as table and columns as specified.
        This method also adds an ID column as the primary key.
        This method also alters the column names.
        Parameters:
        connection - the connection to the current database
        tableName - the name of the table to be created
        columns - the column names and data types

        Parameters:
        connection - the connection to the database
        tableName - the table to be queried

      • createHTML

        public static void createHTML​(String htmlResults,
                              String selection,
                              int option)
        Creates the HTML page of the query results, using DataTable bootstrap
        Parameters:
        htmlResults - the results of the query formatted in in html table
        selection - the date and/or state that was used as a condition for the query
        option - the number of the corresponding query that user selected at the prompt
